Articles.Content:
A quick Google search turned up mods only no suggestions.

I've been wondering science I started ksp why there is only 4 parachutes

3 standard 1 drogue

I'm just suggesting that maybe we should have a radial drogue chute for landings on duna where drogues are brilliant because most interplanetary landers have a docking port on the top of the lander so where should we put drogues. I'm sure this wouldn't be hard to implement just use the model of the mk32-R Radial Mount Parachute, recolour the blue stripes to orange, and copy and tweak the settings of the mk25 Parachute into its settings I'm sure this wouldn't be to hard to implement.

I could do this myself if I knew what program is used to change the colour of the parachute box.

Thanks for reading

Commander jebidiah

P.S. I crashed into the tower
